item.description:
👤 Owner: Hosteroid

📝 Repository: Hosteroid/domain-monitor

📄 Descrizione: A self-hosted PHP domain expiration monitoring tool that tracks domain expiry dates, RDAP/WHOIS data, and SSL certificate validity.
